description: Number of vowels in n (in French).
example: zéro 2, un 1, deux 2, trois 2, quatre 3, cinq 1, six 1, sept 1, huit 2, neuf 2, dix 1, onze 2, douze 3, treize 3, quatorze 4, quinze 3, seize 3, dix-sept 2, dix-huit 3, dix-neuf 3, vingt 1, vingt-et-un 3, vingt-deux 3, ...
author: _Jean-Marc Rebert_
